Two-Factor Authentication Setup: Two-Factor Authentication already configured. Contact support if you wish to reset it.
Two-Factor authenticatie setup: Two-Factor authenticatie is geconfigureerd. Neem contact met ons op als u dit wilt resetten.

Two-Factor Authentication Setup: Download a 2FA app on your phone to scan the QR code and get the authentication code, for example Google Authenticator or Authy.
Two-Factor authenticatie setup: Download een 2FA app op je telefoon om de QR-code te scannen en de authenticatiecode te genereren, zoals Google Authenticator of Authy.

Two-Factor Authentication Setup: You need to set up Two Factor Authentication before continuing.
Two-Factor authenticatie setup: Je moet Two-Factor authenticatie configueren alvorens verder te gaan.

Two-Factor Authentication Setup: Open your 2FA app (for example Google Authenticator or Authy) and enter the 6-digit code to log in.
Two-Factor authenticatie setup: Open je 2FA app op je telefoon (bijvoorbeeld Google Authenticator of Authy) en voer de 6-cijferige code in om in te loggen.
